name: Space Station Designer (Playable Alpha)
description:
Space Station Designer is a construction and management game where you can build huge stations using a large array of modules. The game is under heavy development and its final feature set is still being defined based on the input we’re getting from our community.

If you like space stations and management games, please feel free to download the playable alpha build and try it out! We’d really appreciate if you can take a few minutes to complete this survey so that we can steer our efforts towards the type of features you want to see implemented.

Follow us on Twitter and check out our development blog in order to stay up to date with the latest news.
